name: CANSUPPORT
briefDescription: CanSupport provides palliative care to patients with cancer. As most people prefer the comfort of their home when their cancer advances we send teams of doctors nurses and counselors to their homes in and around New Delhi to provide the care and support that they need. Our teams have been recognized internationally for the quality of their care, and because of the support of our donors, all our services are provided free of charge as they target the most vulnerable. Patients and their families also have access to a help-line, subsidized supportive medication and equipment, daycare, counseling services, training for family members in basic nursing skills, peer support, patient navigation services and other resources. In the last 12 years, more than 24,000 people including patients facing advanced cancer and their carers have benefited from CanSupportâ€™s programmes and received information care and medical supplies/equipment free of charge
